docs.summary: Site owners, group members, site members can share files on the website or mobile app
Adds permissions for roles
Responds with actions authorized for items
When upload is completed client should notify server for file to become available
Creates new folder. Duplicate folders with same name are allowed

params.name: settings
params.doc: Settings object

params.name: fieldMask
params.doc:
Array of paths that should be sent. Nested objects separated with dot.
 Example { "fieldMask": ["uploadSettings.allowVideoUploads"] }

docs.summary: Updates app settings with values specified by field mask
Deletes file or folder. In case of folder cascades to its children.

Returns download url for one or many library items

 When single file id is given - url to download that file will be returned.
 When multiple ids are given - url to download a zip archive containing all requested files will be returned.
 When given one or more folder ids - all subfolders are traversed and included into archive with all files they contain.

 Zip will start generating upon access of that url.
 Client can start downloading zip immediately without waiting for 100% completion.
 Zip is expiring. When url is expired 410 HTTP status will be returned with body { message: "expired" }

 Does not increment view count

 Downloads can be performed by everyone or only site members. This is controlled in file sharing settings from the editor.
Favorites file or folder
Gets library items by their ids

 More on upload flow and example at https://www.npmjs.com/package/wix-file-sharing-client#upload-file
Updates access permission flags for a given library item

Gets url for provided file for preview

Increments unique view counter for folder
when a new folder is created in File Share application of your site
is executed for each successful complete file upload action in File Share
Whenever a file is successfully deleted in File Share application of your site

When a folder is successfully deleted in File Share application of your site.
 If the folder was not empty, respective delete events will be fired once the contents of the folder are deleted.

members.name: kind
members.doc: The kind of value.

members.name: nullValue
members.doc: Represents a null value.

members.name: numberValue
members.doc: Represents a double value.

members.name: stringValue
members.doc: Represents a string value.

members.name: boolValue
members.doc: Represents a boolean value.

members.name: structValue
members.doc: Represents a structured value.

members.name: listValue
members.doc: Represents a repeated `Value`.

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load

members.name: offset
members.doc: number of items to skip in the current sort order

members.name: count
members.doc: The number of items returned in this response

members.name: offset
members.doc: The offset which was requested

members.name: total
members.doc: The total number of items that match the query

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: A flag that indicates the server failed to calculate 'total' field

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by

members.name: order
members.doc: Sort order (ASC/DESC). Defaults to ASC

members.name: filter
members.doc: A filter object. See documentation [here](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rnd/platformization-guidelines/api-query-language#platformization-guidelines_api-query-language_defining-in-protobuf)

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sort object in the form [{"fieldName":"sortField1"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","direction":"DESC"}]

members.name: paging
members.doc: Limit number of results

members.name: fields
members.doc: Projection on the result object - list of specific field names to return. If fieldsets are also specified, return the union of fieldsets and fields

members.name: fieldsets
members.doc: Projection on the result object - list of named projections. E.g. "basic" will return id and name fields. Specifying multiple fieldsets will return the union of fields from all. Specifying fieldsets and fields will also return the union of fields.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs.

Defaults to root folder
 Assigns permission to specific library item
 Permission is applied for all children as well

members.name: libraryItemId
members.doc: Folder

members.name: message
members.doc: TODO: add limit

members.name: itemId
members.doc: File sharing item id

members.name: name
members.doc: Nickname of user or site member

members.name: imageUrl
members.doc: Avatar picture url

members.name: id
members.doc: Unique id for each item

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of file or folder

members.name: createdBy
members.doc: Creator of file or folder. Can be user, contributor or site member id.

members.name: createdByName
members.doc: Nickname of user who created this item

members.name: parentFolderId
members.doc: If library item is in root parent folder will be equal to root folder id from app settings response.

members.name: createdByProfile
members.doc: Profile of library item creator

members.name: path
members.doc: Full path to this item starting from root.

members.name: timesFavorited
members.doc: Number of times item has beed favorited by site members or users

members.name: isFavorited
members.doc: Flag indicating if item is favorited by current user

members.name: uniqueViews
members.doc:
Number of times item has been viewed.
 For folder - views are incremented when user drills in to that folder
 For file - views are incremented when user double clicks file to view it in the browser
 Downloading folder of file does not increment view counter

members.name: isViewed
members.doc: Flag indicating if item is viewed by current user

members.name: availability
members.doc:
Indicates what kind of availability is set for this item.
 PUBLIC - anyone can see it
 MEMBER - only some members can see it
 PAID - member needs to buy paid plan to see it

members.name: extension
members.doc: File extension. Example file.pdf will have extension 'pdf'

members.name: sizeInBytes
members.doc: File size in bytes

members.name: childrenCount
members.doc: Number of files and folders directly inside this folder. Subfolder children are not included.

members.name: lastModified
members.doc:
Date of last action that happened in given folder.
 Actions that update this date: file upload, sub folder creation, rename.
 Actions in sub folders do not bump this date.

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of folder. For root folder '/'.

members.name: name
members.doc: Folder name

members.name: parentFolderId
members.doc: Under which parent to create folder. Empty for root folder.

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of file trying to upload. For validation only to be able to fail fast on unsupported files.

members.name: size
members.doc: Deprecated

members.name: sizeInBytes
members.doc: File Size in bytes. Used for validation against app settings value.

members.name: parentFolderId
members.doc: Parent folder to upload to. Empty for root.

members.name: quotaExceeded
members.doc:
Client specified unique for this request id. Will be provided in response to match errors/successes
 When total site storage for library items exceeds the limit with this upload

docs.summary:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the `Value` type union. The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`. Possible values are:
  • NULL_VALUE - Null value.

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC

Possible values are:
  • CREATE_FOLDER
  • UPLOAD_FILE
  • MODERATE
  • ACCESS

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • NONE
  • VIEW
  • CONTRIBUTE
  • MANAGE

Possible values are:
  • ALL_MEMBERS
  • ADMINS
  • CUSTOM
  • PLAN
  • MEMBER
  • SITE_VISITORS
  • BADGE

Possible values are:
  • PUBLIC - indicates if provided library item is visible by anonymous users when false only members having ACCESS permission can see library item
  • PUBLIC_CONTENTS_HIDDEN - Folder is still public but access to its contents is restricted
  • HIDDEN - Folder and its contents will be visible only to members having access permission

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • PUBLIC
  • MEMBER
  • PAID

Possible values are:
  • OTHER
  • MUSIC
  • VIDEO
  • IMAGE
  • DOCS
  • FONT

Possible values are:
  • MOVE
  • RENAME
  • DELETE
  • DOWNLOAD
  • CREATE_FOLDER
  • UPLOAD_FILE
  • VIEW
  • FAVORITE
  • MANAGE_PERMISSIONS

Possible values are:
  • STORAGE
  • VIDEO_DURATION

Possible values are:
  • FILE
  • FOLDER

Possible values are:
  • DESC
  • ASC

Possible values are:
  • CREATED_AT
  • NAME
  • TYPE
  • TIMES_FAVORITED
  • UNIQUE_VIEWS
  • LAST_MODIFIED
  • SIZE

Possible values are:
  • UNWANTED_OR_SPAM
  • HARASSMENT_OR_BULLYING
  • INAPPROPRIATE_CONTENT
  • HATE_SPEECH_OR_GRAPHIC_VIOLENCE

Possible values are:
  • DEFAULT_REASON - No exact reason. Depends on status if action is ALLOWED or FORBIDDEN
  • NOT_ALLOWED_ON_ROOT - This action is not allowed because it tried on root folder
  • MISSING_PERMISSION - Site member is missing permission to perform action
  • MUST_BE_PUBLIC - Site member who is performing this action is private so it is not allowed because it will expose site member
  • OWNED_BY_ANOTHER_USER - Only available for item owners
  • FOLDER_NOT_EMPTY - Can't delete non empty folder
  • MUST_BE_A_MEMBER - Additionally is_allowed_for_all_members will be set if all members are granted this action Usually this means user must log in in order to perform this action
  • NOT_ALLOWED_ON_SUBFOLDERS_THIS_DEEP - Action only available on root or first level subfolders
  • NOT_ALLOWED_ON_FILES - Action only available on subfolders

Possible values are:
  • ALLOWED - Action is allowed
  • FORBIDDEN - Action is forbidden without any specific reason

Possible values are:
  • ANYONE
  • MEMBERS_ONLY

Possible values are:
  • EXTENSION
  • CLASSIC
  • LINE

Possible values are:
  • LEFT
  • RIGHT

Possible values are:
  • LIST
  • THUMBNAIL
